column2: "Dɛm na EWURADZE ka kyerɛ ne nyia ɔasera no
column3: Sirus a mesuo ne nsa nyimfa mu dɛ mebɛbrɛ amanaman adze wɔ n’enyim
column4: na masansan ahemfo asen; dɛ mubobuebue mbobow wɔ n’enyim

column3: na mama mbea a ayɛ kekakeka no ayɛ dɛfɛɛ: mubobubu boran mbobow no mu esinesin
column4: na metwitwa adaban no mu."

column3: na ehuntsambea ahonyadze a wɔdze esuma bɛma wo
column4: ama eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no a mobɔ wo dzin frɛ wo no."

column3: na Israel a masan mu eyi no ntsi
column4: mobɔ wo dzin frɛ wo: mato wo ebusuadzin
column5: kaansa ɔwo nnhun me mpo a."

column3: na obi nnyi hɔ bio; Nyankopɔn bi nnyi hɔ ka mo ho: mobɔbɔ wo abɔdo
column4: kaansa ɔwo nnhun me mpo a:"

column3: dɛ obi nnyi hɔ ka mo ho: emi nye EWURADZE
column4: na obi nnyi hɔ bio."

column3: na mobɔ sum; emi na meyɛ asomdwee
column4: na mobɔ mbusu; emi nye EWURADZE a ɔyɛ ndzɛmba yinom nyinara."

column3: hom mfi ɔsor nsosɔw
column4: na hom mma wimu ntɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee ngu: asaase mbuebue
column6: na ɔmma ɔnye ndzeyɛtsenenee mbɔ mu mfifir; emi EWURADZE na mabɔ."

column2: "Nyia ɔnye no Bɔfo dzi esi no
column3: ondue! Asaase do ntankofɛr mu ɔtankofɛr! Aso awendɛtse bɛse nyia ɔwen no no dɛ
column4: Ereyɛ dɛn nye yi? Anaa w’edwuma no nnyi nsa?"

column3: Ebɛnadze na awo no yi
column4: anaa ɔbaa dɛ
column5: Ebɛnadze na ekoo no awoo yi no ondue!"

column3: Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi
column4: na no Bɔfo no se nye yi: Hom mbisa me ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba ho asɛm; hom nhyɛ me mbra wɔ me mbabanyin ho

column3: na mabɔ nyimpa wɔ do: emi
column4: me nsa ara a
column6: na hɔn dɔm nyinara emi na mahyɛ."

column2: "Emi na mama no do wɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee mu
column3: na mebɛtsentsen n’akwan nyinara: ɔno na ɔbɛkyekyer mo kurow
column4: na ɔama m’amantufo afa hɔn ho tɔtrɔtɔ
column5: nnyɛ tsibo bi anaa akatua bi ntsi

column3: Egypt edwumadze
column4: na Etiopia eguadze
column8: na wɔbɛyɛ wodze; wobedzi w’ekyir; mpokyerɛ mu na wobotwa mu aba: na wɔbɔkotow wo
column11: Nyankopɔn wɔ wo mu; na obi nnyi hɔ bio

column3: ɔwo nye Nyankopɔn a ihuntsa woho
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn

column3: hɔn enyi bɔto
column4: nyew
column5: hɔn enyim bogu ase: hɔn a wɔyɛ ehonyi nyina bɔbɔ mu ahyɛ ahoraa."

column3: EWURADZE dze ɔdomankoma nkwagye agye no nkwa: hom enyi ronnto
column4: eso hom enyim runngu ase ara daapem."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE a ɔbɔɔ ɔsorsor no se nye yi; ɔno nye Nyankopɔn; nyia ɔhyehyɛɛ asaase na ɔyɛe; ɔno na ɔdze tsiim hɔ
column3: ɔammbɔ no pan
column4: ɔhyehyɛe ama wɔaatsena mu: emi nye EWURADZE; na obi nnyi hɔ bio."

column3: sum mu asaase beebi
column4: na makasa; mannse Jakob asefo dɛ
column5: Hom nhwehwɛ me basabasayɛ mu: emi EWURADZE

column2: "Hom nhyiahyia hom ho na hom mbra; hom mbɔ mu ntwe mbɛn
column3: hom a hom efi nsa wɔ amanaman mu: hɔn a wɔsoso hɔn ehonyi a woesian no ndua
column4: na woyi mpaa ma onyame a onntum nngye nkwa no

column3: na wɔmma ompue
column4: nyew
column5: wɔmma wɔmbɔ mu ntu egyina; woana na ofi tsetseberdo ɔakyerɛ iyi? Woana na ɔaka yi akyerɛ dadaada? Aso nnyɛ emi EWURADZE a? Na nyame bi nnyi hɔ ka mo ho; pɛrpɛr Nyankopɔn na Agyenkwa; obi nnyi hɔ ka mo ho."

column3: hom ndan mbra mo hɔ
column4: na hom nnya nkwa: osiandɛ emi nye Nyankopɔn

column3: asɛm no efi m’anomu kɔ wɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee mu
column4: na ɔnnkɛsan
column5: dɛ emi na anankoroma nyinara bɔkotow me
column6: na tɛkyerɛma nyinara bɛka me ntam."

column3: EWURADZE mu ara nko na ndzeyɛtsenenee na ahoɔdzen wɔ: ne nkyɛn ara na adasa bɛba
column4: na hɔn a hɔn bo fuuw no nyinara hɔn enyi bɔto."

column2: "EWURADZE mu na Israel asefo nyinara bedzi bem
column3: na wɔahyehyɛ hɔnho."
